trans-unit.source: Represents the default version of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService"></xref> created by the workflow runtime engine if no other workflow loader service is added.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class creates a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowLoaderService> object when the runtime engine is started, if no other workflow loader service derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService> has been added as a service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowLoaderService"></xref> class.
Creates a root activity definition tree by using the specified workflow <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the workflow to create.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> object that represents the root activity definition tree.
Creates a new root activity definition tree by deserializing the .xoml and the .rules files.
<xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> that holds the workflow XOML definition (.xoml file).
<xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> that holds the workflow rules (.rules file).
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> object that represents the root activity definition tree.
